messages.message:
Hi team
If were to validate effect of underlying infra changes (for ex: node autoscaling in/out) on the SaaS Platform/AIHub, what's the best way to observe?
Specifically looking for proactive information and not from customer generated traffic like typical RED metrics. Do we have platform status readings available in grafana? How often and what all they measure?
The reason for not looking for customer generated traffic is I would like to be able to test the disruptions even in a Standalone sandbox kind of environment.
I am aware we have a load testing framework, I have not used it so far and not sure how closely production traffic can be simulated since goal is not to stress the system itself.
afaik we do not have test suites like these that intentionally test scenarios like triggering node scale up, autoscaling controllers etc

hmm, to clarify further, I don't want to trigger autoscaling. I want to observe the failures in the platform when let's say underlying node restarts/crashes impacting whatever pods were running on it.
